price: 9. Eeg siday kuugu yeeleen tusaalooyin 3, oo ay u lumeen, una karin (qaadidda) Jid (Toosan - Islaamka).
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: 3. Oo malahooda ah si ay kuu beeniyaan oo wax kuugu dhimaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa ḍarabū laka al-amthāla faḍallū falā yastaṭīʿūna sabīlan
